page.title: 17Services
page.content: Main water supply is available in the area but in some cases the distance of the main from a property is considerable and and the cost of connection is prohibitive so a private supply is used. Other households use private water supplies from choice considering the quality of the water superior to mains supply particularly after a recet incident of phenol contamination. Most properties pay standard water rates but all farm supplies from the mains are metered as large quantities are used. No mains sewerage system being available each available each property has its own disposal system. Wste disposal is mostly by septic tank draining into the subsoil. The council houses in Llandygwydd do not have indiviual septic tanks but are all connected to a small sewage disposal plant.
